comments.content: yeah, and its a new font again! :-)

And it seems to be a very popular style these days! See also Perfect Sketch:

[http://new.myfonts.com/fonts/wiescherdesign/perfect-sketch/](http://web.archive.org/web/20131023165248/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/wiescherdesign/perfect-sketch/ "http://new.myfonts.com/fonts/wiescherdesign/perfect-sketch/")
yes, mr. wiescher mades very, very fast fonts.

Thanks for that link, Joerg! I am a fan of Gert Wiescher's [Franklin Gothic Hand](http://web.archive.org/web/20131023165248/http:/new.myfonts.com/search/name%3A%28franklin+gothic+hand%29/fonts/) series. :-)
